basics.name: Sachin S
basics.label: Cybersecurity Analyst & Machine Learning Enthusiast
basics.summary: Aspiring Cybersecurity Analyst and Machine Learning enthusiast with a strong background in data analytics, cybersecurity tools, and AI-driven solutions. Experienced in operations analysis, penetration testing, and leading cybersecurity communities.

work.name: ATMEGA Software Technologies
work.summary: Collaborated with project executives and clients to streamline workflows, coordinate daily tasks, and improve productivity in a dynamic startup environment.
highlights: Organized task scheduling for a 15-member team
Enhanced team coordination and communication to meet project goals

work.name: IP Security Labs
work.summary: Conducting vulnerability assessments and penetration testing for small-scale startups and non-profits using tools such as Burp Suite and Kali Linux.
highlights: Secured digital connections and identified vulnerabilities
Leveraged knowledge in network security and tools like Metasploit, Nessus and Burp Suite

projects.name: CNN-based Firewall
projects.description: Developed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN)-based firewall for network security, capable of detecting malicious network traffic and preventing potential cyber threats in real-time.
highlights: Utilized deep learning techniques to classify network traffic as normal or malicious.
Achieved high accuracy in detecting various types of network-based attacks.
Integrated with a real-time monitoring system for dynamic threat response.

projects.name: AI-based Malware Detection
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to detect malware using AI techniques, enabling efficient and automated identification of harmful software.
highlights: Trained the model on various malware datasets for high detection accuracy.
Implemented feature engineering to improve model performance.
Developed a user-friendly interface for analyzing malware behavior.

volunteer.summary: Organized events and trained students in Google Cloud technologies.
highlights: Conducted 10+ events in association with Google
Certified as Google Cloud Digital Leader

volunteer.summary: Directed the OWASP Erode Chapter, conducting online CyberAwareness and training events.
highlights: Led initiatives to promote cybersecurity awareness

courses: Data Analysis using Python and R
